title: FormFileObject
description: The content of `<input type="file">` as parsed by `formidable`.

size.description: The size of the uploaded file in bytes. This property says how many bytes of the file have been written to disk yet

filepath.description: The path this file is being written to.

originalFilename.description: The name this file had according to the uploading client.

mimetype.description: The mime type of this file, according to the uploading client.

mtime.description: A `Date` object (or `null`) containing the time this file was last written to.  Mostly here for compatibility with the [W3C File API Draft](http://dev.w3.org/2006/webapi/FileAPI/).

hash.description: If `options.hashAlgorithm` calculation was set, you can read the hex digest out of this var (at the end it will be a string).
